scalar:array.comment: /** * Smarty Internal Plugin Filter Handler * * Smarty filter handler class * * @package Smarty * @subpackage PluginsInternal * @author Uwe Tews */
/** * Class for filter processing * * @package Smarty * @subpackage PluginsInternal */

/** * Run filters over content * * The filters will be lazy loaded if required * class name format: Smarty_FilterType_FilterName * plugin filename format: filtertype.filtername.php * Smarty2 filter plugins could be used * * @param string $type the type of filter ('pre','post','output') which shall run * @param string $content the content which shall be processed by the filters * @param Smarty_Internal_Template $template template object * @return string the filtered content */
